channel.title: Comments on: Women Only: The Frauenraum
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: collidoscopeks
item.dc:creator: collidoscopeks
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://collidoscopeberlin.local/2016/05/31/the-frauenraum/#comment-68512">Julia</a>.
Hi Julia! You can help without speaking German. Volunteer-planner.org has an English site and you can find lots of opportunities there (or check out the Give Something Back to Berlin Frauenraum project). Good luck and happy volunteering! - Sophia
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Julia.

Hi Julia! You can help without speaking German. Volunteer-planner.org has an English site and you can find lots of opportunities there (or check out the Give Something Back to Berlin Frauenraum project). Good luck and happy volunteering! – Sophia

item.title: By: Julia
item.dc:creator: Julia
item.description: Hi! I would love to get involved with voluntering at the Frauenraum. Is it still possible to help if I can't speak German?
item.content:encoded: Hi! I would love to get involved with voluntering at the Frauenraum. Is it still possible to help if I can’t speak German?
